attributes.action: cancel all plans for reform of the house of lords until a debate has been held on the purpose of the house of lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So far an incredible ammount of govermental time has been wasted on attempts to reform the house of lords for one simple reason:

There has been no sensible national debate nor debate within the upper and lower houses as to what purpose we want the upper house to fullfil.

Until such time as we have concensus on the purpose of the upper house all legislation is bound to fail.
